title: FS- BL 350 Bill Maloney PSA 1.5 (Pop One, One Higher)
author: JoeC1991

posts.post_title: FS- BL 350 Bill Maloney PSA 1.5 (Pop One, One Higher)
posts.post_content:
Great card for Rare Back or Master Set collectors. Two examples of this combo have been graded by PSA, none by SGC. The other known example is a PSA 2. Asking 3k. 

Please email [url]jlcors11@gmail.com[/url] for pictures and/or interest.
